attributes.action: Scrutinise Jatropha oil as a reliable substitute for crude oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Fuel prices going sky high and threats increasing daily to th climate. Surely now is the time to support imports of Jatropha oil. This reduces emissions by 85% and is a constnt supply which has no detrimental effects to the environment. The oil is easier and cheaper to produce than many if notall ofother green energies,it also has a proven track record. Thirdworld countries would also benefit ,transforming expensive aid to a reliable and necessary industry.
